iscontent.title: Metal Bellows
iscontent.text:
Aerosun-Futai manufactures standard and custom hydroformed metal bellows and assemblies. We offer about 50 years experience in the design of single and multiply bellows in various materials and sizes from 9.5mm diameter and larger.

MATERIAL
Copper Alloy
Austenitic Stainless Steels

iscontent.title: Welded Bellows
iscontent.text:
Aerosun-Futai has fabricated custom welded bellows and assemblies for our customers for about 40 years. We offer welded bellows in various materials and sizes from 9mm diameter to 400mm and min. thickness 0.076mm.

MATERIAL
Austenitic Stainless Steels
AM350
Hastelloy C alloys
Haynes alloy 242
Inconel 625 and 718
Titanium

PRODUCT APPLICATIONS
• High-vacuum Technology
• Electronic Technology
• Mechanical Seals

• Measurement and Control Systems
• Vibration isolator

Convolution Configurations

iscontent.title: Metal Hose
iscontent.text: Aerosun-Futai Metal Hose Assemblies are available in a variety of 300 series stainless steels, from 6mm thru 600mm nominal inside diameters. Aerosun-Futai offers a wide variety of Flexible Metal Hoses to meet the most stringent requirements of all industrial and commercial applications.

iscontent.title: Expansion Joints
iscontent.text: Aerosun-Futai started to design and manufacture the expansion joint products about 50 years ago. Since then our expansion joints line kept widening and improving to fulfill the most sophisticated appliance required by our customers. Aerosun-Futai is the first manufacturer in China which designs and fabricated expansion joints for diesel exhaust piping system and gas insulated substation industries, and its bellows products are used in a wide variety of piping applications to compensate for piping displacement due to temperature difference, and to absorb equipment vibration or pipe motions. Aerosun-Futai is the name recognized in China as the leader in bellows industry for its reliable products.

iscontent.title: Engineering
iscontent.text:
Using state of the art software such as 3D modeling software along with finite element analysis (FEA), Aerosun-Futai’s engineers can analyze the performance of the expansion joint and design a safe and reliable product to meet your specifications with lower cost.
Bellows is the key element of the expansion joint. Aerosun-Futai uses the equations shown in the Standards of Expansion Joint Manufacturer's Association as the basis for their bellows designs.
Aerosun-Futai is one of the main writers of the Chinese Standards JB/T 10617 and TB/T2726.
The following standards or codes may be used to design and to manufacture expansion joints:
• Chinese Standards: GB/T 12777, GB 16749, GB/T 12522, JB/T 10617 and TB/T2726
• EJMA
• ASME B31.1 and ASME B31.3
• EN 13445 (Chap. 14 for PED compliance)
• EN 14917
• PED 97/23/EC
Consult with Aerosun-Futai for another design code required.

iscontent.title: Types of Products
iscontent.text:
Aerosun-Futai manufactures various types of expansion joints with single and/or multiply bellows sized from 50mm to over 5000mm in diameter. Bellows materials utilized include stainless steels, nickel based alloys, titanium and many others for extreme pressure, temperature and corrosive conditions.

EXPANSION JOINT PRODUCTS
• Single & Universal Expansion Joints
• Universal Tied Expansion Joints
• Pressure Balanced Expansion Joints (Elbow, In-Line and By-Pass)
• Single & Double Hinge & Gimbal Expansion Joints

iscontent.title: Test
iscontent.text:
Aerosun-Futai is capable to perform in-house testing such as spring rate testing, movement capability testing, pressure and stress testing, vacuum and leak testing, fatigue testing and burst testing etc. In addition to utilizing these tests to further our own knowledge of expansion joints, it can be utilized for customer specific expansion joint testing.

The bellows expansion joint is a flexible element and also the weak point in piping system. This must to be kept in mind in the whole procedure of product designing, materials choosing and manufacturing. To ensure the highest degree of reliability, we perform the following tests on request during construction of expansion joint in addition to dimensional control:
Material Test (Hardness, Tensile, Elongation and Chemical Composition)
NDT Test (PT, RT and UT)
Hydrostatic/Pneumatic Pressure Test
SF6/Helium Leak Test
Inspection of Coating Thickness.
